Class InputController

    • Controller.InputController

extends java.lang.Object

      • handleMouseInput

        public void handleMouseInput(java.awt.event.MouseEvent me)
        Function for EditorView use. It add or delete Brick, depending on fields od Mouse Event me.
        Parameters:
        me - MouseEvent, contains info about desirable action.

      • handleInput

        public void handleInput(java.awt.event.KeyEvent ke)
        Funtion, which processes players inputs. It may change fields of controller and model.
        Parameters:
        ke - KeyEvent. Contains information about Key on which action occured.

      • saveResult

        public void saveResult(java.lang.String name)
        Function called from EditorsView, when player enters his name in TextField. It passes name to resultModel, where it is saved, and make ResultsView referesh list of players.
        Parameters:
        name - to save

      • showHallOfFame

        public void showHallOfFame()
        Function shows best results. It is called during the game, when Player hits proper shortcut and at the end of the game.

      • showEditor

        public void showEditor()
        Function shows editor. It is called during the game, when Player hits proper shortcut.

      • addEditorBrick

        public void addEditorBrick(java.awt.event.MouseEvent me)
        Adds brick to the editorModel's list and refreshes editorView.
        Parameters:
        me - MouseEvent passed to editorModel.

      • deleteEditorBrick

        public void deleteEditorBrick(java.awt.event.MouseEvent me)
        Deletes brick from the editorModel's list and refreshes editorView.
        Parameters:
        me - MouseEvent passed to editorModel.

      • clearEditorList

        public void clearEditorList()
        Deletes all bricks from the editorModel's list and refreshes editorView.

      • makeEditoListFull

        public void makeEditoListFull()
        Fill all free space in the editorModel's list with bricks and refreshes editorView.

      • changeBrick

        public void changeBrick(int i)
        Passes new editorView's selected brick to editorModel.
        Parameters:
        i - HP of new brick, passed to editorModel.

      • saveLevel

        public void saveLevel(int level)
        Function called when player hits "Save" button in editorView. Passes number of level to editorModel and, if needed, increases list of levels in editorView.
        Parameters:
        level - level number to pass to editorModel.

      • changeLevel

        public void changeLevel(int selectedIndex)
        Function called when playe using the mouse change level in editorView. Passes seleccted level to editorModel in order to load new list of bricks. Shows new bricks in editorView.
        Parameters:
        selectedIndex - to pass

      • keyReleased

        public void keyReleased(java.awt.event.KeyEvent ke)
        Function called when user stops pressing left or right arrow and therefore racket should stop moving.
